title: 8 "A Coward Crybaby! Shirahoshi, the Mermaid Princess"Transliteration: "Yowamushi de Nakimushi! Ningyo Hime Shirahoshi" (Japanese:弱虫で泣き虫！人魚姫しらほし) Moe Maehara Ken Satou December 22, 2024(2024-12-22)
transformers_text: 8 A Coward Crybaby S hira hoshi the Mermaid Princess Transliteration Yo wamu shi de Nak imu shi Ning yo Hime S hira hoshi Japanese Moe Mae hara Ken Sato u December 22 2024 2024 12 22 At Mermaid Cove Caribou escapes from his barrel with the help of mermaids and traps them in a bog using his Devil Fruit powers The Straw Hats are wrongly accused of kidnapping the mermaids and become wanted after Madam Shy a rly confirms her prophecy about Luffy destroying Fish man Island to F uk a boshi At Ryu gu Palace Luffy stumbles upon Princess S hira hoshi and saves her from an attack by Van der De cken who plans to marry her S hira hoshi befriends Luffy and opens up about her isolation Nami Us opp and Brook refuse arrest and Zoro rejoins them after escaping from prison Meanwhile Van der De cken and Hod y Jones form an alliance to overthrow King Neptune
